alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coffee County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elba, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Alberton, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Perry Store, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Danleys Crossroads, Eanon, Turner Crossroads, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Goodman, New Haven and Tabernacle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
